title: Executive Order 12350-Termination of Urban and Community Impact Analyses
content: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution of the United States of America, Executive Order No. 12074 of August 16, 1978, entitled "Urban and Community Impact Analyses," is hereby revoked.

RONALD REAGAN
The White House,
March 9, 1982.
[Filed with the Office of the Federal Register, 3:57 p. m., March 9, 1982]
citation: Ronald Reagan, Executive Order 12350-Termination of Urban and Community Impact Analyses Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/245561
